  • Method Details

    • getOrdersData

      public ServerResponseDataContainer getOrdersData(Connection dbConn, int supplierID)
      Fetches orders data including associated items for a specific supplier.
      Parameters:
      dbConn - the database connection used to execute the SQL query
      supplierID - the ID of the supplier whose orders are to be fetched
      Returns:
      a ServerResponseDataContainer containing a map of orders to lists of items and a response message

    • UpdateOrderStatus

      public ServerResponseDataContainer UpdateOrderStatus(Connection dbConn, int[] orderInfo)
      Updates the status of an order based on the provided information.
      Parameters:
      dbConn - the database connection used to execute the SQL query
      orderInfo - an array where the first element is the order ID and the second element is the status flag
      Returns:
      a ServerResponseDataContainer containing the result of the operation and the approval time if applicable

    • updateTakeAwayArrivalTimeDate

      private void updateTakeAwayArrivalTimeDate(Connection dbConn, String currTime, String currDate, int orderID)
      Updates the arrival time and date of a takeaway order in the `orders` table.
      Parameters:
      dbConn - the connection to the database
      currTime - the current arrival time to be set, in `HH:mm:ss` format
      currDate - the current arrival date to be set, in `yyyy-MM-dd` format
      orderID - the unique identifier of the order to be updated

    • RefreshAwaitingOrders

      public ServerResponseDataContainer RefreshAwaitingOrders(Connection dbConn, int supplierID)
      Refreshes and retrieves awaiting orders for a specific supplier.
      Parameters:
      dbConn - the database connection used to execute the SQL query
      supplierID - the ID of the supplier whose awaiting orders are to be fetched
      Returns:
      a ServerResponseDataContainer containing a map of orders to lists of items and a response message

    • createOrderFromResultSet

      private Order createOrderFromResultSet(ResultSet rs) throws SQLException
      Creates an order object from the provided ResultSet.
      Parameters:
      rs - the ResultSet containing the order data
      Returns:
      an Order object populated with data from the ResultSet
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs or the ResultSet is not properly configured

    • fetchItemsForOrder

      private List<ItemInOrder> fetchItemsForOrder(Connection dbConn, int orderID) throws SQLException
      Fetches a list of ItemsInOrder objects associated with a specific order ID.
      Parameters:
      dbConn - the database connection used to execute the SQL query
      orderID - the ID of the order for which to fetch items
      Returns:
      a List of ItemInOrder objects associated with the specified order ID
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs or the SQL query fails
